rdt.tree.node

Class InnerNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • rdt.tree.node.Node
      • rdt.tree.node.InnerNode

  • public class InnerNode
extends Node
    Class for a inner-node. An inner-node is a node in a decision tree which has child-nodes. It contains an array of child-nodes and a splitter. The splitter is used to forwarded incoming instances to the correct child-node.
    Author:
    MK

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InnerNode()
      Creates a new InnerNode without a splitter.
      InnerNode(Splitter splitter)
      Creates a new InnerNode with the given splitter.
